original_title: Big Love - An Invitation to Disaster
overview: A short film broadcast on the Network 21 pirate tv station in 1987.  "a short film, devoid of soundtrack, of a youth on a cross spinning suspended in fire, over which was superimposed another youth languishing in an armchair... apparently John Maybury's 'Big Love'." - John Chairman
title: Big Love - An Invitation to Disaster
